title: Agent Auction
description: Multi-agent auction system with Python, simulating bidding strategies and decision-making logic.

title: DeepFake Detection
description: AI pipeline for detecting deepfakes using CNNs, transformers, and attention-based models with Grad-CAM explainability.

title: Air Quality Beijing
description: Data analysis and machine learning on Beijing air quality dataset, predicting pollutants and visualizing environmental trends.
